```{r setup, include=FALSE, cache=FALSE}

library("knitr")

### Chunk options ###

## Text results
opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning=TRUE, message=TRUE)

## Code decoration
opts_chunk$set(tidy=TRUE, comment = NA, highlight = TRUE)

## Cache
opts_chunk$set(cache = 2, cache.path = "output/cache/")
opts_chunk$set(cache.extra = rand_seed)

## Plots
opts_chunk$set(fig.path = "output/figures/")
opts_chunk$set(dpi = 300, fig.align = "default")   # may want 'center' sometimes

# Figure format
#opts_chunk$set(dev='pdf')
opts_chunk$set(dev='png')   # choose this one for HTML or markdown output? Or 'svg'
# may include dev.args as a list... see knitr help

def.par <- par(no.readonly = TRUE)




### Hooks ###

## Crop plot margins
knit_hooks$set(crop = hook_pdfcrop)   # requires dev="pdf"



```
